import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const AddUserScreen = () => { const [firstname, setFirstname] = useState('') const [lastname, setLastname] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [phone, setPhone] = useState('') const [address, setAddress] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') useEffect(() => { setPassword(`${(firstname+lastname).trim().slice(0,4)}`) },[firstname, lastname]) const onSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(password) console.log(firstname, ' ', lastname, ' ', email, ' ', phone, ' ', address) } return ( <>
setFirstname(e.target.value)}/>
Looks good!
Please enter your first name.
setLastname(e.target.value)}/>
Looks good!
Please enter your last name.
setEmail(e.target.value)}/>
Looks good!
Please provide a valid email address.
setPhone(e.target.value)}/>
Looks good!
Please provide a Phone Number.
Looks good!

* These fields are required.

) } export default AddUserScreen
